homePage.title: Yevhenii Madzhar – Fullstack Developer

hero.description: With over 3 years of experience creating beautiful, responsive, and high-performing web applications, I specialize in fullstack development — delivering everything from sleek user interfaces to reliable backend systems using modern technologies.
